p: For a large cohort of COVID-19 (n = 100) and non-COVID-19 patients (n = 26), patients were stratified into groups based on severity: ‘COVID-19-ICU’ (n = 50), ‘COVID-19-Non-ICU’ (n = 50) and ‘Non-COVID-19′ (n = 26). Spearman’s rank correlations were performed to determine the strength of the relationships between viral entry gene CTSL and viral response genes MX1, SAMHD1, IFITM3 and TRIM25. A multiple linear regression model was also fitted using the lm function in R to determine whether the relationship between viral defense genes and CTSL expression was statistically significant.
